title: Internet & Web Basics
description: Understand how the internet and web work, including browsers, servers, HTTP, and DNS.
long_description: Covers the foundational concepts of how data flows across the internet, how browsers communicate with servers, and how web pages are delivered and rendered.
learning_objectives: Learn core internet concepts and how web communication works.
outcomes: Ability to explain how a website request flows from browser to server and back.

seo.meta_title: Internet and Web Basics for Frontend Developers
seo.meta_description: Learn how the internet works, including HTTP, DNS, browsers, and web communication basics.

title: HTML (Core)
description: Learn the structure and semantics of web pages using modern HTML.
long_description: Focuses on writing semantic, accessible, and SEO-friendly HTML to create well-structured web pages.
learning_objectives: Understand semantic markup and proper document structure.
outcomes: Ability to build accessible and well-structured HTML pages.

seo.meta_description: Master semantic HTML, accessibility basics, forms, and SEO-friendly markup.

title: CSS (Core)
description: Learn how to style and layout web pages using modern CSS.
long_description: Covers layout systems, responsive design, and modern CSS features for building visually consistent UIs.
learning_objectives: Learn how to create responsive and flexible layouts.
outcomes: Ability to design responsive and modern web layouts using CSS.

seo.meta_title: CSS Core for Modern Web Design
seo.meta_description: Learn CSS layouts, Flexbox, Grid, responsive design, and modern styling techniques.

title: JavaScript (Core)
description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript to build interactive web applications.
long_description: Focuses on JavaScript basics, DOM manipulation, async programming, and API interactions.
learning_objectives: Understand core JavaScript concepts and browser APIs.
outcomes: Ability to create interactive and dynamic web experiences.

seo.meta_description: Learn JavaScript fundamentals, DOM, async programming, and API usage.

title: Version Control
description: Learn how to track and manage code changes using Git.
long_description: Covers basic Git concepts and workflows for managing source code history.
learning_objectives: Understand how to use Git for source control.
outcomes: Ability to manage code versions and collaborate using Git.

seo.meta_description: Learn Git fundamentals for tracking changes and managing code repositories.

title: VCS Hosting
description: Learn how to use Git hosting platforms to collaborate on projects.
long_description: Focuses on GitHub workflows including issues, pull requests, and basic automation.
learning_objectives: Learn how to collaborate using GitHub.
outcomes: Ability to manage repositories, issues, and pull requests.

seo.meta_description: Learn how to use GitHub for collaboration, issues, and pull requests.

title: Code Editors & Dev Setup
description: Set up a productive development environment for frontend development.
long_description: Covers editor configuration, extensions, and terminal basics for efficient development.
learning_objectives: Learn to configure tools for efficient development.
outcomes: Ability to work productively with modern code editors and terminals.

seo.meta_description: Learn how to set up VS Code, extensions, and terminal for frontend development.

title: Package Managers
description: Learn how to manage project dependencies using modern JavaScript package managers.
long_description: Covers installing, updating, and managing dependencies using tools like npm, pnpm, and yarn.
learning_objectives: Understand how to manage project dependencies efficiently.
outcomes: Ability to install, update, and manage frontend project dependencies.

seo.meta_description: Learn npm, pnpm, and yarn to manage frontend project dependencies.

title: Build Tools & Bundlers
description: Learn how to bundle and build modern frontend applications.
long_description: Covers modern build tools for fast development and optimized production builds.
learning_objectives: Understand how modern build tools work.
outcomes: Ability to configure and use modern bundlers for frontend projects.

seo.meta_description: Learn Vite and modern bundlers to build and optimize frontend applications.

title: Writing CSS (Modern)
description: Learn modern approaches to writing and managing CSS in large applications.
long_description: Covers utility-first CSS and scoped styling approaches for scalable frontend styling.
learning_objectives: Learn modern CSS methodologies for scalable styling.
outcomes: Ability to manage styles efficiently in modern frontend projects.

seo.meta_description: Learn Tailwind CSS and modern CSS approaches for scalable frontend styling.

title: JavaScript Frameworks
description: Learn modern JavaScript frameworks for building scalable user interfaces.
long_description: Covers component-based frameworks used to build complex frontend applications.
learning_objectives: Understand component-based UI development.
outcomes: Ability to build scalable frontend applications using modern frameworks.

seo.meta_description: Learn React and other modern JavaScript frameworks for frontend development.

title: Meta Frameworks (Production Apps)
description: Learn production-grade frameworks for building full-featured frontend applications.
long_description: Covers frameworks that add routing, SSR, and production optimizations on top of UI frameworks.
learning_objectives: Understand production application architecture.
outcomes: Ability to build production-ready frontend applications.

seo.meta_title: Meta Frameworks for Production Frontend Apps
seo.meta_description: Learn Next.js, Astro, and other meta frameworks for production frontend apps.

title: State Management
description: Learn how to manage application state in modern frontend applications.
long_description: Covers local and global state patterns for scalable frontend apps.
learning_objectives: Understand state management patterns.
outcomes: Ability to manage complex application state effectively.

seo.meta_description: Learn Context API, Zustand, and Redux Toolkit for state management.

title: API & Data Handling
description: Learn how to fetch and manage data from external APIs.
long_description: Covers REST APIs, data fetching patterns, and basic GraphQL concepts.
learning_objectives: Learn how to work with APIs and async data.
outcomes: Ability to integrate frontend apps with backend APIs.

seo.meta_title: API and Data Handling in Frontend
seo.meta_description: Learn REST APIs, Axios, and data fetching patterns for frontend apps.

title: Forms & Validation
description: Learn how to build and validate forms in modern frontend applications.
long_description: Covers form handling and schema validation in modern UI frameworks.
learning_objectives: Understand modern form handling techniques.
outcomes: Ability to build robust and validated user input forms.

seo.meta_description: Learn modern form handling and validation techniques.

title: Testing
description: Learn how to test frontend applications effectively.
long_description: Covers unit, integration, and end-to-end testing for frontend apps.
learning_objectives: Understand frontend testing strategies.
outcomes: Ability to write and run automated frontend tests.

seo.meta_description: Learn Vitest, Playwright, and modern frontend testing approaches.

title: Linters & Formatters
description: Learn how to maintain code quality and consistency.
long_description: Covers linting and formatting tools to enforce coding standards.
learning_objectives: Understand automated code quality tools.
outcomes: Ability to maintain consistent and clean codebases.

seo.meta_description: Learn ESLint, Prettier, and code quality tools for frontend projects.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Learn how to optimize frontend applications for speed and user experience.
long_description: Covers performance audits, loading strategies, and techniques to improve real-world performance metrics.
learning_objectives: Understand how to measure and improve frontend performance.
outcomes: Ability to identify and fix performance bottlenecks.

seo.meta_description: Learn Lighthouse, code splitting, and web vitals to optimize frontend performance.

title: Web Security
description: Learn how to secure frontend applications and protect user data.
long_description: Covers common frontend security concepts and web vulnerabilities.
learning_objectives: Understand frontend security risks and protections.
outcomes: Ability to apply basic security best practices in frontend apps.

seo.meta_description: Learn HTTPS, CORS, and common web security risks for frontend applications.

title: Authentication & Auth Flows
description: Learn how authentication works in modern web applications.
long_description: Covers authentication concepts and integrating third-party auth providers.
learning_objectives: Understand authentication and authorization flows.
outcomes: Ability to integrate secure login and auth flows.

seo.meta_description: Learn JWT, OAuth, and auth providers for frontend authentication.

title: Deployment & Hosting
description: Learn how to deploy and host frontend applications in production.
long_description: Covers modern deployment platforms and hosting workflows.
learning_objectives: Understand frontend deployment pipelines.
outcomes: Ability to deploy and manage frontend applications in production.

seo.meta_description: Learn Vercel, Netlify, and modern frontend hosting platforms.

title: Monitoring & Error Tracking
description: Learn how to monitor frontend apps and track runtime errors.
long_description: Covers tools and techniques for observing application health in production.
learning_objectives: Understand production monitoring concepts.
outcomes: Ability to track and debug production frontend issues.

seo.meta_description: Learn Sentry and monitoring tools for frontend applications.

title: Web APIs & Advanced Browser APIs
description: Learn advanced browser capabilities for modern web applications.
long_description: Covers storage, background processing, and offline capabilities.
learning_objectives: Understand advanced browser APIs.
outcomes: Ability to use advanced browser features in web apps.

seo.meta_description: Learn Service Workers, Web Workers, and browser storage APIs.

title: Accessibility (Advanced)
description: Learn advanced accessibility techniques for inclusive web applications.
long_description: Covers standards and advanced accessibility testing techniques.
learning_objectives: Understand accessibility standards and testing.
outcomes: Ability to build accessible and inclusive web interfaces.

seo.meta_description: Learn WCAG, ARIA, and accessibility testing for frontend apps.

title: Design Systems
description: Learn how to build and maintain scalable design systems.
long_description: Covers component libraries, theming, and design consistency practices.
learning_objectives: Understand design system architecture.
outcomes: Ability to create and maintain reusable UI components.

seo.meta_description: Learn component libraries and Storybook for scalable design systems.

title: Mobile & Desktop (Optional Career Boost)
description: Learn how to extend frontend skills to mobile and desktop platforms.
long_description: Covers cross-platform technologies for building mobile and desktop apps.
learning_objectives: Understand cross-platform frontend development.
outcomes: Ability to build apps beyond the browser.

seo.meta_description: Learn React Native, Electron, and cross-platform frontend development.

title: Engineering Practices
description: Learn professional engineering workflows and best practices.
long_description: Covers collaboration, architecture, and scalable project practices.
learning_objectives: Understand professional frontend engineering practices.
outcomes: Ability to work effectively in professional engineering teams.

seo.meta_description: Learn code reviews, PR practices, and scalable frontend architecture.

title: Portfolio & Career
description: Learn how to build a strong frontend portfolio and prepare for interviews.
long_description: Covers personal branding, real-world projects, and frontend interview preparation.
learning_objectives: Understand how to present skills professionally.
outcomes: Ability to build a strong portfolio and prepare for frontend roles.

seo.meta_description: Learn how to build a frontend portfolio and prepare for frontend interviews.
